animeTitle: One Piece: Densetsu no Log! Akagami no Shanks!
otherNames: The Legendary Log! Red-Haired Shanks!, 伝説の記録！赤髪のシャンクス！
synopsis: As the world anticipates the legendary diva Uta’s show in Elegia, the Red-Hair Pirates are making some disturbing moves. Koby remembers how Shanks ended the Paramount War at Marineford.
